title: When I click selfie, it reduces the height & increases the width of my face after processing. Help?!
content:
Whenever I click a selfie from Google Pixel 4a, it reduces the height of my face and increases the width of my face, and makes my face look fat while actually, it is not, what is the solution?
I have updated the software, cleared the cache, force stopped the camera app, explored all the settings. Nothing works! Help!
